relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Hermione's feelings, as she is angry and frustrated with Cormac McLaggen.
Cormac McLaggen has been dominating the conversation with his Quidditch achievements, which is a source of frustration for Hermione.
Professor Trelawney greets Harry when she notices him for the first time.
